column2: The Elder Days are gone. The Middle Days are passing. The Younger Days are beginning.

column1: The '''Middle Days''' were those that succeeded the [[Elder Days]] in [[Middle-earth]]. With the Elder Days being the years of the world before the end of the [[First Age]],<ref>{{App
column2: B}}</ref> the Middle Days were therefore the [[Second Age
column4: Third]] Ages of the world. The Middle Days would be succeeded by the [[Younger Days]], marked by the [[Dominion of Men]].<ref name=council>{{FR
